Text: Exhibit 1  2. Services play a growing and undervalued role in global value chains In 2017, gross trade in services totaled $5.1 trillion, a figure dwarfed by the $17.3 trillion global goods trade. But trade in services has grown more than 60 percent faster than goods trade over the past decade (Exhibit 2).
Cause: But trade in services has grown more than 60 percent faster than goods trade over the past decade (Exhibit 2).
Effect: Exhibit 1  2. Services play a growing and undervalued role in global value chains In 2017, gross trade in services totaled $5.1 trillion, a figure dwarfed by the $17.3 trillion global goods trade.
